title: Story: Web UI Visual Enhancements
description:
Improve web UI readability and visual design with hierarchy type icons, capitalized type names, and improved node header formatting. Builds on state transition buttons foundation to create a polished, production-ready graph visualization experience.

Completed improvements:
- Hierarchy type icons (‚≠êüì¶üìù‚òëÔ∏è) configurable via config.toml
- Capitalized type names in node headers (Epic, Story, Task)
- Improved header format: (icon) (Type) #shortid
- Better visual alignment and spacing

Future improvements tracked separately.
